definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: If you do, you will master the English language step by step.
sentences.chinese: 这样的话，你就能一步一步地说一口流利的英语了。

sentences.english: The beauty host displayed the professional with fluent English.
sentences.chinese: 主持人用流利英语开始了庆典，展现了乐其的专业性。

sentences.english: Li Ming speaks English a lot fluently than Wang ping .
sentences.chinese: 李明讲英语和王林讲得一样流利。

sentences.english: We should train our students to speak English fluently and accurately.
sentences.chinese: 我们应培养学生流利而准确地讲英语。

sentences.english: She him all the better for his fluent spoken English.
sentences.chinese: 正因为他迟踊口流利的英语，她更爱他。

sentences.english: We must learn to speak English fluently and correctly.
sentences.chinese: 我们应当学讲流利正确的英语。

sentences.english: Tremblay is a native French speaker, fluent English speaker and is conversant in Mandarin.
sentences.chinese: 马大夫是法国人，可以说流利的英语和汉语。
要想流利你需要时间和专心练习。

sentences.english: and you will master the English language step by step.
sentences.chinese: 你就能一步一步地说一口流利的英语了。

sentences.english: My spoken English is fairly good enough to express myself fluently.
sentences.chinese: 我能用英语口语把本人的念法流利地表达出来。

sentences.english: Speaking good English is a pice of cake.
sentences.chinese: 说一口流利的英语是小菜一碟。

sentences.english: Most of the time, however, being fluently bilingual is not enough.
sentences.chinese: 然而，大多数时候，拥有流利的双语能力还是不够。

sentences.english: how many beasts we heard talking good French like that?
sentences.chinese: 我们听过多少“野兽“像那样讲流利的法语？

definition: (of singing or speaking) very articulate pronunciation and vocalizing
Mandarin (common language)/Putonghua (common speech of the Chinese language)/ordinary speech
to understand (by hearing)/to catch (what sb says)
diction/enunciation/to pronounce the words correctly (in opera)
